name: Classic Party Guacamole Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: large avocado, medium roma tomato, red onion, jalapeño, lime, salt, pepper, fresh cilantro, tortilla chips
recipeIngredient: 2 large avocados, pitted, peeled, and diced
1 medium Roma tomato, seeded and diced
recipeInstructionSteps: In a medium bowl, combine the avocado, tomato, red onion, jalapeño, lime juice, salt, and pepper. Mix together until fully incorporated. Top with cilantro, if using.
